name: UAV & Drone Solutions
about: UAV & Drone Solutions (UDS) specializes in providing aerial security surveillance and inspection services, ensuring safety and security in critical environments. Our trained flight crew conducts surveillance operations to deter and detect criminal activity, guiding ground security for effective arrests and enhanced situational awareness. UDS offers professional survey and inspection services across various industries, utilizing leading-edge surveillance systems and AI technologies. With a strong compliance record, including the first RPAS Operators Certificate (ROC) in South Africa, UDS has expanded its operations to serve government entities, mines, and industrial facilities. Our cadet pilot program and in-house training organization enable candidates to join the RPAS industry. UDS is committed to delivering highly effective and tailored surveillance solutions, protecting people, infrastructure, and assets with precision and expertise.
